option.voxitone.close.tooltip: Should VoxelMap close when pathing is started.
option.voxitone.tempwaypoint.tooltip: Should A Temporary Waypoint be created.
option.voxitone.enablewaypoint.tooltip: Should the temporary waypoint be visible.
option.voxitone.drawonminimap.tooltip: Whether or not the current path should be drawn on the minimap.
